name: I'm Home
description:
https://globalgamejam.org/2019/games/im-home-2

A game about the melancholy of returning home and coming to terms with the past memories of your home.

Jam Site: 

Brunel University, London

Diversifiers: 
Forgive and Fortify (Sponsored by iThrive Games)
Let me show you how it's done!

Platforms: 
MS Windows

Technology Notes: 
Clickteam Fusion 2.5
